quoteText: For all unscheduled interruptions in the provision of the Services, which are due to hardware or telecommunications failures that last longer than 5 minutes, UpCloud shall offer compensation to the Customer.
title: Users are provided compensation according to Upcloud's service level agreement for any unscheduled interruptions

tosdr.case: Users are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of service state in the Service Level Agreement that "for all unscheduled interruptions in the provision of the Services, which are due to hardware or telecommunications failures that last longer than 5 minutes, UpCloud shall offer compensation to the Customer." Note that there are are situations that will be exempt from UpCloudâ€™s service guarantee.
